snippet: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, President Obama’s nominee, had a surprisingly cordial confirmation hearing.
abstract: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, Pres Obama’s nominee to replace Kathleen Sebelius as secretary of health and human services, charms senators at surprisingly cordial confirmation hearing, even picking up a couple of Republican endorsements.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, President Obama’s nominee, had a surprisingly cordial confirmation hearing.

headline.main: Pick to Replace Sebelius Draws Senators’ Praise at Confirmation Hearing
headline.print_headline: Pick to Replace Sebelius Draws Senators’ Praise at Confirmation Hearing
